shortdesc.ph: Starts recording the local audio and video.

p.codeblock: virtual int startRecording(const RtcConnection& connection, const media::MediaRecorderConfiguration& config) = 0;

p.ph: After obtaining the object by calling
, you can call this method to record the local audio and video.

section.p: This method can record the audio captured by the local microphone and encoded in AAC format, and the video captured by the local camera and encoded in H.264 format. The SDK can generate a recording file only when it detects audio and video streams; when there are no audio and video streams to be recorded or the audio and video streams are interrupted for more than five seconds, the SDK stops the recording and triggers the (, ) callback.

Once the recording is started, if the video resolution is changed, the SDK stops the recording; if the sampling rate and audio channel changes, the SDK continues recording and generates audio files respectively.
section.note: Call this method after joining a channel.
